# Filter to HTTPS events that were not decrypted due to a policy-based SSL Decryption bypass
(bypass_traffic eq 'yes' and ssl_decrypt_policy eq 'yes')

# Filter to websites that weren't decrypted due to SSL/TLS certificate validation errors or bypassed from traffic steering to Netskope
(bypass_traffic eq 'yes' and ssl_decrypt_policy eq 'no')

# Filter to events generated by non-browser user agents
(useragent notlike 'Mozilla' and useragent notlike 'ST Agent' and useragent neq '')

# Filter to events where the destination uses a non-standard HTTP/HTTPS port.
(dstport neq '80' and dstport neq '443')
